Hello Nicolas,

The fix for HER-1756 that was ultimately applied tries to make sure everything is written before FINISHED happens, using only the previously existing phases. Thus reports should be written in the STOPPING phase.

Noah


Nicolas Giraud wrote:
> 
> 
> Hi,
> 
> I am using Heritrix 1.14.3 within NetArchiveSuite, and the software 
> stores crawl reports for analysis : hosts-report.txt, basically anything 
> *-report.txt.
> 
> I have noticed that Heritrix reports a "FINISHED" status even while some 
> reports are still not finished to be created, so we ended up missing 
> some of these reports. I have programmed a workaround within NetArchive 
> Suite, however it doesn't always work.
> 
> Having read the release notes of Heritrix 1.14.4, I would like some 
> extra explanation on fix https://webarchive.jira.com/browse/HER-1756. 
> Can I assume that when Heritrix transitions from status "FINISHING" to 
> "FINISHED" all these reports have been generated? If not is there a 
> reliable way to test this?
> 
> Best regards,
> 
> -- 
> Nicolas Giraud
> ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
> D�veloppeur Archives du Web - Biblioth�que Nationale de France
> Web Archiving Developper - National Library of France
